text: Hi <@UDEASNWEB>. Thank you for the tip. I m trying with <div class="element_with_background" style="background-image: url({{ module.image_background.src }})">
Background: i m trying to insert an image module insiede the blog post header, but i still want to let the marketing modify the background image of the module
i realized this: style="background-image: url('{{ module.image_background.src }}')". Now is working, i have forgotten te ' ' inside the css url
AHA. Hard to see those mistakes!
Oh yes. Thank you for make me thinking threw a different point of view.

Hi team,

I would like  to know which feature it's being used by this (<https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/apps/marketing/live-chat/infobip-whatsapp-automation-211305|https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/apps/marketing/live-chat/infobip-whatsapp-automation-211305>) provider it order to have a right side card with a button that when clicked displays a pop up window.
